description: Delve into the relationship between NFTs and the music industry with essential resources and platforms. Explore how NFTs and blockchain technology are transforming the music business by offering new revenue streams for musicians. Learn about sustainable practices within the NFT space as well.
keywords: NFTs, music industry, blockchain technology, royalty distribution, NFT marketplaces, eco-friendly blockchain, OpenSea, Zora, sustainable practices
title: Further Reading and Resources
